mapper.insert: insert into cly_customer(username, password, email, phone_number, customer_type, salt) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{customerType}, #{salt})
mapper.select: select count(*) from cly_customer where username = #{username}
select count(*) from cly_customer where email = #{email}
select count(*) from cly_customer where phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
